member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.InitializeReceiveCustomWebHooks(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes support for receiving WebHooks generated by the ASP.NET Custom WebHooks module. Set the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Custom' application setting to the application secrets, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1, id2=secret2'. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/custom/{id}'.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.CustomReceiverResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.CustomReceiverResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.CustomReceiverResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.CustomReceiverResources.Receiver_BadEvent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not parse WebHook data: {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.CustomReceiverResources.Receiver_BadHeaderEncoding
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The '{0}' header value is invalid. It must be a valid hex-encoded string..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.CustomReceiverResources.Receiver_BadHeaderValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid '{0}' header value. Expecting a value of '{1}={2}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.CustomReceiverResources.Receiver_NoEcho
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The WebHook verification request must contain a '{0}' query parameter which will get echoed back in a successful response..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomNotifications
member.summary: Describes one or more event notifications received from a party supporting WebHooks generated by the ASP.NET Custom WebHooks module.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomNotifications.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique ID of this WebHook message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomNotifications.Attempt
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times this message has been attempted to be delivered.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomNotifications.Properties
member.summary: Gets the set of additional properties included in this WebHook message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomNotifications.Notifications
member.summary: Gets the collection of notifications included in this WebHook message. Each notification is represented as a where TKey is a property name and TValue is the value of that property. For each notification, the Action can be found using the key Action.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomWebHookReceiver
member.summary: Provides an implementation that can be used to receive WebHooks from parties supporting WebHooks generated by the ASP.NET Custom WebHooks module. Set the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Custom' application setting to the application secrets, optionally using IDs to differentiate between multiple WebHooks, for example 'secret0, id1=secret1,id2=secret2'. The corresponding WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/custom/{id}'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomWebHookReceiver.ReceiverName
member.summary: Gets the receiver name for this receiver.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomWebHookReceiver.VerifySignature(System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Verifies that the signature header matches that of the actual body.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomWebHookReceiver.WebHookVerification(System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Creates a response to a WebHook verification GET request.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.CustomWebHookReceiver.GetActions(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject,System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Gets the notification actions form the given .
